Trade/Device Name(s): Finetest Lite Smart Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Finetest Lite Smart Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
